Welcome to my website! 

I'm Sheena Taylor - a Possibility Thinker, Data-Driven Leader and No Fluff Deal Closer. 
I'm passionate about using data to drive business growth, and I'm always up for a challenge and most known to be resourceful, brilliant, gorgeous, talented, and fabulous!

“If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.” ― Martin Luther King Jr.

Fun Fact: Did you know that only 3% of tech workers are Black women? As a Black woman in tech, I'm proud to be part of this underrepresented group, breaking barriers for future generations.

As a data scientist, my values revolve around curiosity, critical thinking, and a relentless pursuit of insights. I believe in using data to uncover hidden patterns, tell compelling stories, and drive informed decision-making.
Let me crunch the numbers and craft a narrative that resonates with your target audience. With my analytical prowess and storytelling skills, I can help you unlock the power of data and captivate your customers. Together, we'll embark on a journey of data-driven discovery, where numbers come alive and business thrives.
